title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Julie Dillon
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 95 – August 2014 Cover Art Slumbering Naiad Julie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.

Skip to content
Issue 95 – August 2014
Cover Art
Slumbering Naiad
Julie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Slumbering Naiad by Julie Dillon
